column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the 1/2 & 1/2 pulled pork and sliced brisket with cole slaw
column4: I had no intention of eating all of that
column5: but I wanted to try it all.  The pulled pork and brisket were both very good
column6: either would make a fantastic sandwich.  The cole slaw and fries were also good.  Something just wasn't quite right about the beans though
column7: they were too sweet I think.  Skip the beans
